sentence: Marchant has said that one of them, Doug Mastriano, is a member of his coalition.
author: Steven Harper
title: November 2022: The Anti-Democracy Coalition

sentence: As Donald Trump tried to overturn the results of the 2020 election, there were few officials more willing to help than Doug Mastriano, then a little-known Pennsylvania state senator.
author: Sam Levine
title: Trump loyalists primary win prompts election fears in Pennsylvania
